text: “Ndipo amene adaponderezedwa adzanena kwa amene adadzikweza: “Iyayi, koma (mumachita) ndale za usiku ndi usana (zotitsekereza nazo ku chikhulupiliro) pamene mumatilamula kuti tinkanire Allah ndikumpangira Iye milungu inzake.” Iwo adzabisa madandaulo pamene adzaona chilango. Ndipo tidzaika magoli m’makosi mwa amene sadakhulupirire; kodi angalipidwe china, osati zija ankachita
